definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: The reserve cabernet sauvignon has been aged in French and American oak for 17 months.
sentences.chinese: 这款赤霞珠已在法国和美国橡木桶中陈放了17个月。

sentences.english: It is an excellent wine, and best to taste if stored for five years .
sentences.chinese: 十分出色的酒，陈放五年后饮用最佳。

sentences.english: They are aged in French and American oak.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在法国和美国橡木桶中陈放的。

sentences.english: Ready to drink or age to perfection in 2 years.
sentences.chinese: 可即时饮用或陈放2年后饮用更显完美。

definition: Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
age of wine (i.e. how long it has been matured)
unprocessed sun-dried tea leaves used to make black or green tea
to deposit/to store/to leave in sb's care
